body: @ThatDudePirate Finally there will be an English version of this series after a long wait. I hope your health will be stable again to continue the translation of this series.

Finished TLing the first two chapters but been on/off completing the whole thing due to health. Did a horrendous job with the prequel and wanted to redeem myself (347409). Might be till summer at this rate (Started Feb.) . Also, I use OCL software since I don't speak JPN either, so someone oughta commission a pro for this 'cause I want it done as bad as you guys. Thanks
I really hope this one gets a translation
I have read this guy from Watashi ga Toriko and man, Top tier artist love his shit.
Don't scroll down any further there is a curse comment about the 5 yeah and stuff

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me (i accidentally read this comment, so sorry
There's still material left out of this book, I really hope we get a 4th one so the latest chapters of Shiho appear!
Ahhh Ikumo Taisuke, the best author with the fewest translations on this site.

Bruh that beginning my saying "how and why the hell is she carrying him to a room in a love hotel!? And the guy that must work at the front desk just don't call 911 for this shit!?" But still pretty good
